item.title: 331 Absolute Best Black Friday Deals (2024)
item.description: The shopping season has arrived, and the WIRED team has all the best Black Friday deals and discounts for you.

item.title: 29 Best Black Friday Headphone Deals (2024)
item.description: Looking for a new pair of earbuds or over-ears? Some of our favorite models are on sale right now.

item.title: 38 Best Black Friday Gaming Deals (2024), Consoles and Games
item.description: A Nintendo Switch bundle for $225? A PS5 Slim for more than $100 off? These Black Friday gaming deals are bonkers.

item.title: Best Kindle Black Friday Deals and Amazon Device Sales (2024)
item.description: The brand-new Kindle lineup is on sale for Black Friday, as are many other Amazon products, from Eero routers to Echo speakers.

item.title: The Best Black Friday Air Fryer and Kitchen Deals (2024)
item.description: Air fryers, pizza ovens, rice cookers, and everything else you need in your holiday kitchen.
